main_block.title: Dedicated Servers
main_block.description: The most reliable and high-performance equipment for any demanding business tasks and more.

operation_systems_block.title: Operating Systems to Choose From
operation_systems_block.description: Install any up-to-date operating system, including from your ISO image.

main_info_block.title: Server Control Panel
main_info_block.description: A variety of tools for comfortable server management. From reinstallation to configuring network firewall. *Available on some tariffs.

main_info_block.title: Multiple Available Locations
main_info_block.description: Choose the most suitable location for your server from popular locations. Minimum ping allows for more comfortable work.

main_info_block.title: Ability to Install Windows
main_info_block.description: Our staff can install any up-to-date version of Windows on your server. We use standard official systems that you can activate yourself.

main_info_block.title: DDoS Protection
main_info_block.description: Our locations offer the option to connect DDoS protection. Don't let intruders harm your project.

not_finded_information_block.title: Didn't Find What You Were Looking For?

faqItems.question: How is a dedicated server different from VDS/VPS?
faqItems.answerTitle: How is a dedicated server different from VDS/VPS?
faqItems.answerDescription: First and foremost, it should be noted that the difference in services is that a dedicated server is physical equipment. This device, the resources of which are entirely at your disposal, not shared with anyone else. You get full power and use it as you see fit within the existing rules. Dedicated servers significantly surpass ordinary VDS in power and conditions, making them the most logical and justified choice for large-scale projects.

faqItems.question: How to manage a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerTitle: How to manage a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerDescription: After activating the service, the user, similar to a virtual server, receives all the necessary data to work with the server. In some locations, access to the cloud control panel is provided, where you can use functions such as automatic OS reinstallation, activate SystemRescue, and many other features.

faqItems.question: How long does it take to set up a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerTitle: How long does it take to set up a dedicated server?
faqItems.answerDescription: Different locations have different timeframes for setting up the server. In case of potential delays, employees will notify you in advance of the installation and activation timelines. According to our regulations, the service processing time is up to 48 hours.

faqItems.question: What DDoS protection is provided on the servers?
faqItems.answerTitle: What DDoS protection is provided on the servers?
faqItems.answerDescription: By default, all our dedicated servers are equipped with standard DDoS protection, which is sufficient to repel small attacks or when you know that no serious attacks are expected on your server. But if you have unscrupulous competitors or the server's operation is critical, in some locations, we offer additional connection of servers to advanced DDoS protection, which will repel even the largest attacks with a traffic volume of up to 3.5 Tbit/s. More details.

faqItems.question: Is it possible to purchase a server with a non-standard configuration?
faqItems.answerTitle: Is it possible to purchase a server with a non-standard configuration?
faqItems.answerDescription:
Our engineers are ready to assemble any dedicated server according to your needs.
Contact us through a request in your personal account or via email support@spacecore.pro

support_block.title: Online Support Chat
support_block.description: Have questions? Write to us in the chat! Support 24/7
